title: Got kicked out of my club/cant see my club even though im the owner
body: I hadn't played Leauge in a while, and when i logged back on after about a month or so without playing (I think it was during the club update) i couldn't see my club anymore. When my friends who are in the club log in, they can see that i am still a member, and the admin, only that i'm shown as "Offline" even though im not. If someone could help me with this problem i would appreciate it greatly.

replies.body: This may be due to a club outage that caused issues like this. I may be able to get this refreshed for you!  What's the exact name and tag of your club?  Let me know!

I Have the same problem and have since tried several things to get back but the club is all but dead now with only my smurf and one friend that never plays anymore. 

Poroclese, would it be possible to delete the club for me? Or just add me again?

The Fake Purse Ninjas
TFPN

Thanks in advance

Wait you can fix these now!? Wanna try mine? Tag:FLWD   Exact Name:Fox Lizard Wolf Dragon

Confirmed worked! Thanks for the fix. To the OP, there was a bug that owners of clubs that didn't log in to play during a short period had invisible clubs (as in other members could see you still part of it). Apparently they can fix it now. =D{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Help!
